title: The newsroom becomes a commons
description: In 2026, the newsroom becomes a commons. For 117 years, the New York Amsterdam News, just steps from the Apollo Theater, has anchored Harlem. As the city’s oldest Black-owned newspaper, it has long covered “the news that mainstream media just doesn’t.” Since Covid, most of its staff works remotely, but the building still tells stories:...
